summary: An ordinance amending Sections 9, 10 and 20, of Ordinance 45382, as heretofore amended, said ordinance being entitled: "An ordinance regulating and restricting the location of trades and industries; regulating and limiting the use of buildings and premises and the height and size of buildings; providing for yards, courts or other open spaces; establishing districts for the said purposes, defining offenses; prescribing penalties and repealing all ordinances or parts of ordinances in conflict therewith", approved June 28th, 1923, and adding thereto two new sections, to be known respectively as Section 2T and Section 17U.
